attributes.action: Make sentencing more strict for people who abuse and kill animals.
attributes.additional_details: Too many offenders are getting away with abusing/killing animals. These offenders are walking the streets like nothing happened. Animals are living beings just like humans. An offender sentenced for murder or manslaughter receives 10-15 years or life with a maximum. Why can’t the same sentence be given to these offenders abusing animals?
attributes.background: Make sentencing offenders who abuse and kill animals more stricter. Thousands of offenders are being let off with a slap on the wrist and a fine and ban stating they can’t keep any type of animal.
